title: A minor request
author: VD
content_html:
To the four or five concerned Americans who are regular WND readers and inveterate mass emailers: please don’t send me WorldNetDaily columns. Believe it or not, as a WND columnist for the last five years, I am passing familiar with the web site and have even been known to read its articles from time to time.

Thank you.
content_text:
